general this pattern is crocheted in the round the chain 1 at the beginning of each round does not count as a st the 1st stitch of each round after the chain 1 is made in the next stitch the last stitch of each round is made in the same st as the chain 1 was made in except in round 1 if the last st is a single_crochet if the last st is a double_crochet lock previous/next color s in the last st each round is closed with a slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st stitch of the round change to the 1st color of the next round in the pull through of the closing slip_stitch of each round after color change leave the color s of the previous round behind for easy pick up in a next round when a round is crocheted with 2 or more colors pull through the color that is going to be used first in the next round it is the color that is mentioned first when closing the previous round don t forget to take along the additional color s for that round by crocheting over it/them when crocheting tapestry in a round when multiple colors are used in a round the round is crocheted in tapestry the color mentioned first is the color to start the round with the other color s mentioned should be taken along in that round writing in bold is to be crocheted with the color mentioned in bold writing in blue is to be crocheted in the color mentioned in blue change to the next color in the last pull through of the previous color see photos below crochet over the color s that is/are not in use thus carrying it/them along the basic rules of overlay mosaic crochet apply all single_crochet are made in blo of the next st unless stated otherwise all double_crochet are made in flo of the st that is 2 rounds straight under the next st unless stated otherwise when there is no increase you will skip the st behind the double_crochet for increase of stitches the st behind the double_crochet is not skipped © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 7 pattern round 1 a remember the starting chain 1 does not count as a stitch in a magic_ring chain 1 16 half_double_crochet slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st half_double_crochet and continue with the same color pull the magic_ring closed 16
